proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is burning $50,000 a year on manual proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Current proposals take hours. Our system does it in 47 seconds, letting you focus on boosting client campaigns.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every moment spent crafting proposals is a tangible loss for KBD.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes 5 hours. That's 260 hours a year not spent pitching new business, costing $20,000 annually.

problems.title: Opportunity Loss
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean lost clients. You miss out on an estimated 10 new clients per year, costing $15,000 in fees.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually created proposals can lead to brand inconsistency, costing you credibility and $5,000 in lost trust annually.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Mistakes in proposals cause confusion and rework, bleeding $3,000 in potential revenue correction each year.

problems.title: Limited Capacity
problems.description: With only 2 team members, proposal overload limits your growth. You're losing an estimated $5,000 in potential business.

problems.title: Low Morale
problems.description: Tedious proposal writing affects team morale, reducing productivity by 10%, equating to a $2,000 annual loss.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI automation system eliminates these losses entirely.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, crafting proposals is a long, manual process. With our system, proposals are ready in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Human error in proposals leads to costly mistakes. Our AI provides error-free proposals every time.

solutions.title: Increased Capacity
solutions.description: Limited resources mean fewer proposals. Our system increases capacity, allowing more client acquisition.

solutions.title: Enhanced Morale
solutions.description: Proposal drudgery lowers morale. Automated proposals free your team to focus on strategic tasks.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Unlock Acme Corp's Potential with KBD's Proven Marketing Strategies.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will implement targeted campaigns to convert more of your traffic into paying customers, increasing your bottom line.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant financial losses due to missed opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. This results in an estimated monthly loss of $10,000.

problems.title: Brand Visibility
problems.description: Your brand's low visibility in the market leads to potential customers opting for competitors. This represents a loss of market share by 15% annually.

problems.title: Customer Engagement
problems.description: Lack of effective engagement strategies leads to a 30% higher churn rate than industry average, costing approximately $5,000 monthly.

problems.title: Social Media Reach
problems.description: Underutilized social media platforms result in a missed opportunity to reach 20,000 potential new customers monthly.

problems.title: SEO Performance
problems.description: Poor SEO optimization results in low search engine rankings, costing you visibility and resulting in a 40% drop in organic traffic.

problems.title: Content Strategy
problems.description: Inadequate content strategy fails to engage your audience, leading to a 25% decrease in repeat visitors over the past year.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address these issues to boost your revenue and market presence.

solutions.title: Targeted Advertising
solutions.description: We design ad campaigns that convert by reaching the right audience and maximizing ROI. This reduces your acquisition costs.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Enhancing your site's SEO will improve your visibility and drive organic traffic, reversing the trend of revenue loss.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Our strategies will increase your social media engagement and reach, converting followers into loyal customers.

solutions.title: Content Marketing
solutions.description: We create compelling content that resonates with your audience, driving engagement and repeat business.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is the partner you need to turn challenges into opportunities.

whyUsCards.title: Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team brings decades of experience in marketing and advertising to your business.

whyUsCards.title: Results-Driven
whyUsCards.description: We focus on data and results, ensuring your marketing dollars are well spent.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric
whyUsCards.description: Your success is our priority, and we tailor our approach to fit your needs.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Growth
whyUsCards.description: We have a track record of helping businesses like yours achieve significant growth.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team driving your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads the strategy and client relationships at KBD, ensuring each project exceeds expectations.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We begin by understanding your business and goals.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We implement the strategies and start working on the solutions.

process.title: Optimization
process.description: We refine our tactics based on data to ensure maximum efficiency.

process.title: Review & Scale
process.description: We assess the outcomes and plan for future scaling.

pricing.description: For businesses starting to expand their reach.

pricing.name: Growth Plan
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses ready to scale rapidly.

proposal2.ctaDescription: We invite you to discuss how we can help achieve your goals.
